name: Antonio Gramsci
influences: Karl Marx, Niccolò Machiavelli, Vladimir Lenin, Antonio Labriola, Georges Sorel, Vilfredo Pareto, Henri Bergson, Benedetto Croce, Giovanni Gentile
influenced: Stuart Hall, Eric Hobsbawm, Ernesto Laclau, Chantal Mouffe, Edward Said, Palmiro Togliatti, Cornel West, Alain de Benoist, Raymond Williams , Néstor García Canclini, Giovanni Arrighi, Alex Callinicos, Nicos Poulantzas, Gayatri Spivak, Bob Jessop
notable_ideas: Hegemony, war of position, the distinction between "traditional" and "organic" intellectuals
